author: MilanoBicocca-pix
body:
#### PR description:
Increased verbosity in the FakeBeamMonitor module in order to properly debug the online BS workflow.

#### PR validation:
The code compiles and runs smoothly when testing it privately on lxplus.

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:
This PR is not a backport and it does not need one.
This PR should not be merged: it has been created so the DQM team can pick up the changes and test it at P5 more easily.
title: [Do not merge] Increase verbosity in FakeBeamMonitor
